title: Playground equipment safety inspection certificates
dataVerified: Playground location, equipment inventory, inspector, inspection date, safety compliance
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake playground certificates. Domain binding verifies certified inspector (CPSI). ASTM F1487/CPSC guidelines compliance. Prevents child injury liability. Parks department requirement.
